snippet: Leos Carax’s film “Holy Motors” explores identity and metaphysics with a helping hand from cinema history.
abstract: Leos Carax film Holy Motors explores identity and metaphysics with a helping hand from cinema history; Carax has made very few films in his long career, but infuses them with energy, bravado and intensity.
lead_paragraph: Leos Carax’s film “Holy Motors” explores identity and metaphysics with a helping hand from cinema history.

headline.seo: Leos Carax Makes ‘Holy Motors’ With Film History’s Help
headline.main: A Farewell to Celluloid With a Tribute
headline.print_headline: A Farewell To Celluloid With a Tribute
